title: Glottography dataset derived from Walker and Ribeiro 2011 "Bayesian Phylogeography of the Arawak Expansion in Lowland South America"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Walker, Robert S. & Lincoln A. Ribeiro. 2011. Bayesian Phylogeography of the Arawak Expansion in Lowland South America. 278(1718). 2562–2567. doi: 10.1098/rspb.2010.2579. Royal Society.
